content: प्रपन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Arriving at, reaching or going to. {@--2@} Resorting to, betaking oneself to; इयं प्रपन्ना तपसे तपोवनं <ls>Ku. 5. 59</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">3. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Taking refuge with, seeking protection with, suppliant or submissive to; शिष्यस्तेहं शाधि मां त्वां प्रपन्नं <ls>Bg. 2. 7.</ls> {@--4@} Adhering to. {@--5@} Furnished or endowed with, possessed of; प्रत्यक्षाभिः प्रपन्नस्तुनुभिः <ls>Ś. 1. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Promised. {@--7@} Got, obtained. {@--8@} Poor, distressed. {@--9@} Effecting, producing.
